website_summaries.verdict: A well-made thermometer by a popular brand that is feature-rich and suitable for most kids, from babies to older children. A worthy investment for dealing with childhood illnesses.
pros: Accurate and easy to use for children of all ages, as it registers temperatures quickly once placed in the ear
Large screen is vivid and easy to read, and it lights up for use in low-light settings
Brand is often recommended by pediatricians
cons: Age Precision feature comes with a learning curve but is worth it for the enhanced accuracy it provides
Price falls on the higher end of the scale

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy originally when I received this thermometer. Seemed to work perfectly. Doesn't make you panic over super low grade what some would call fevers as it shows green until it's high enough to truly have concerns. The thermometer now just flashes various things at me, won't turn off, won't reset and is completely broken. Just bought two months ago and now can't return on Amazon. Not cheap so pretty not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Always Grateful

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase another! Love the the lighted screen!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the light on the screen so when you take a temperature at night or in low lighting you can clearly see what the reading is. The button to change the age of the person you are taking a temp. from is easy to change. I hate the temporal thermometers because they don't always function correction and sometimes give inaccurate readings. TYMPANIC (ear) is the most accurate reading as someone who used to work in the Medical field. This new model by Braun is a dream! Must purchase for your little ones and adults. Easily operable. Fast and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: BleuFox

customer_reviews.title: Recommended this Digital Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: very precise Thermometer with store base and also a space for ears cone covers storage. i recommend the item with the (Thermometer Case by LTGEM - Fits Braun Thermoscan 7 IRT6520 Thermometer EVA Hard Case Travel Protective Carrying Storage Bag) and Braun ThermoScan Lens Filters for Ear Thermometer, LF40US01 (40 Count), Disposable Ear Thermometer Covers.
customer_reviews.author: Medo

customer_reviews.title: A great upgrade from the forehead thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the Exergen Temporal thermometer that I have had for years. Gives much more accurate readings and i like that the display lights up so I can actually see the temperature when needing to get up in the middle of the night. The only thing I don't love is the waste caused by the covers, but I will take it for the accurate readings. I did do a bunch of research before choosing this one to get, and I am happy that I did!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu K

customer_reviews.title: Just getting rid of Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Nothing seems like it goes together except the color! It lays in its container fine but every time you try to slip it in to get a probe cover it is very tight. When you press the tip in to get a cover, it won’t stay on and about 4 other covers fall out. It seemed I spent more time picking and stacking. Also there is not enough difference in infant fever temperatures to warrant having to set it every single time you go to use it. Past my return date and threw all packaging out-stuck with it. Thought expensive = quality. Not true!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent thermometer
customer_reviews.text: After trying multiple thermometers (mouth, rectal, no-touch forehead etc), we landed on this one. It is an excellent thermometer. It measures the temperature within seconds, provides accurate readings, has built-in light that is great for measuring toddler's temperature at night. It also has an option to display temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit. It comes with 20 lens filters, so can be used right away. On a side note, I would recommend to make sure to purchase right lens filters for this model as they can drastically affect the accuracy of reading. I would recommend ordering the filters from Target or other store as the ones I got from Amazon were not right.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: NIce Digital Ear Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I was told by a nurse that ear thermometers are more accurate than the forehead type scanners. This one works great, but I have one huge complaint. Every time you turn the thermometer on to use, you have to select the age of the person you're using it on. You can't just turn it on and take the temperature. It's a major annoyance and I wish I had known this before buying. I have no infants or toddlers in my house, so why do I have to keep selecting "adult" before I use? You should be able to set it to the age, and forget about it from then on.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Arrived DOA
customer_reviews.text: I thought buying the name brand expensive thermometer was the wiser choice to make sure I got quality. Item arrived dead. Returned for a refund. Item turned on for a split second then shut off. I thought it may have been the supplied batteries so I replaced with new batteries, same result.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis H.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I really like Braun ear thermometers. We got our first one over 19 years ago as a baby shower gift. That one lasted us about 15 years. I got the Braun 5 to replace it and equally pleased. My son needs a thermometer for college (daily temperature checks/tracking for COVID) so I wanted a Braun. They are hard to snag, I had to keep checking back to find one that wasn’t over priced. When it arrived, I checked it out and it matches our other Braun. I’m hoping that it will serve him well.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: No no
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waist your money. Its not accurate. I did it 6 times in a row, and the six times it gives different temperature.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: this will give you peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: my toddler son regularly gets high temps of 105 and above. this is the only thermometer i have found to give me accurate consistent readings and lets me know exactly what his temp is. it is comfortable for him and easy to read. the only thing i would change is the need to reset the childs age at the beginning of every reading when it is turned on....if it could just save the last entered age that would be simpler but it's only one tiny step in getting a nice accurate reading so i still highly recommend this product if you really want to know your little one's temp
customer_reviews.author: deligirl2

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this for the first 6 months & now it is very inaccurate. I’m talking 2-3 degrees variation in each reading. Following all instructions (clean tip, same ear, etc) and still getting 96.7 and then 98.4 and then 99.9. My son is 1 year old and I need to be able to take an accurate temperature as a fever can sometimes be the only indication that he is sick. I have been resorting to my old under the arm thermometer that takes way too long, but at least it’s accurate! The variation in it is .2 not several degrees!

customer_reviews.title: A life saver
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is so useful in stressful time when your child wakes you up crying in middle of the night not knowing what’s going on, you don’t know if he or she has a fever you grab the Braun Ear Thermometer and it tells you in 2 seconds if your child has fever finally you can give Motrin or something else, and grab another few hours of sleep :)
customer_reviews.author: Jacuzzi

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had this long but I really like this thermometer. I switched from a Braun temporal which was SUPER inaccurate. I asked for recommendations on Facebook for thermometers and almost all my friends own and love this one. They even have cases you can buy for them on Amazon which I will be purchasing. I think this is as good as it gets for thermometers.
customer_reviews.author: Cortnie

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like the thermometer and it seems to be accurate. One annoyance is requiring you to pick the age of the "child" each time you use it. Everyone in our house is over "36 months" so this is the only option we use. Second thing I am not a fan of is you are required to use the plastic cover or it simply will not work. I should be able to bypass and have the option to clean after use. We only have three in our household and 98% of the time is used for my child. Other then those two issues it seems to be accurate and a good thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent readings
customer_reviews.text: The use of this product has been monitored by a nurse, so I know the technique used to take the temp has been consistent. The temperature readings themselves are not consistent. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Longsworth

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate for child mode
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 1 star due to the lack of accuracy. Not sure if I got a defective one....took my daughter’s temperature (in child mode) when I could see she’s not feeling well and it said 104. I retook it multiple times and the average was around 103.4. Took her straight to hospital and ask to run her temperature and it came back at 98. Works perfect on my wife and I. Not sure what the issue was!?
customer_reviews.author: Jessie binder

customer_reviews.title: Finicky and poorly put together
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer works really well when it works, but it's really finicky to use properly especially on oneself. The problem is that the small plastic lens doesn't really want to stay into place. Every time it moves a bit, the thermometer trips, stops measuring, and warns that there's no lens in place. This turns taking the temperature into a chore as you have to do it multiple times, trying to figure out if it's working or not, until you find a magic angle which doesn't cause the lens to displace.
customer_reviews.author: Lanugo

customer_reviews.title: More expensive but prob worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be highly accurate. Easy to use except I wish I didn't have to select the age range EVERY SINGLE TIME...ugh. It's not the end of the world, but if you don't have kids it just adds an inconvenience. I just reuse the ear shield things and wipe them off. If I was going between different people or had a possible ear infection I guess I change them. Works fast and is probably more reliable than the no-name Chinese brands so worth the extra $10 or so.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smithers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: We had a Braun ear thermometer when our kids were growing up. I'm happy to say Braun still makes a good quality thermometer! I had bought an inexpensive Chinese brand recently but ended up throwing it out and bought this one. Very happy with my choice!
customer_reviews.author: R. Eichelberger

customer_reviews.title: COLOR CODING IS AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: if your like me and have a disgusting little germ infested toddler around whos always sick then get this thermoscan. Not that im lazy, but in the middle of the night when im half asleep and my kid is burning up having it flash green yellow or red at me makes it easy to decide my course of action. always accurate. I recommend getting more of the tips for it when you order or one day youll run out and scramble.
customer_reviews.author: grizzzzzzzz

customer_reviews.title: Works for my medically complex one year old.
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use on my medically complex kid. The only thing that drives me crazy is you have to select the age each time. This would not be a big deal if I did not use it every day multiple times during the day. Wish it defaulted till I changed it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Useless and Inaccurate in Age of COVID-19
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is completely useless. The thermometer I received looked like it had already been opened. Probably just sent me one someone else returned because of the inaccurate results. The temperatures results I get from this thermometer are all over the place in a wide range. I never know if my kids or I have a temperature. And especially during these times of the COVID-19 pandemic, this is just unacceptable!! Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.author: TreeSea

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Thermometer; Age Range Gets Old
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is fast and accurate. What I DON'T love is needing to select the age range EVERY TIME. It gets really annoying. Also, the display is a bit blinding when trying to use with an infant at night. Makes it hard to get the thermometer into the ear. I would love to see a model with the display on the opposite side. This would help to guide in the tip in low light. And please retain the age range. I don't want to have to think more than I need to at 3 AM.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shumway

customer_reviews.title: Pretty accurate
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter after being frustrated with a temporal monitor. Easy to use thermometer Although when I first hit power it would be amazing if it were a bit easier to pick the age category. Thermometer has been pretty accurate, a few points off in each ear
customer_reviews.author: Katy M

customer_reviews.title: Major pain
customer_reviews.text: This temporal thermometer seems accurate but it requires an age setting before each and EVERY use. There are only adults using it in this household. There should be some way to set age permanently but there is not. Major oversight by this manufacturer. It’s like having to play a video game just to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Bostonian

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Best thermometer! I’ve spent literally hundreds of dollars trying to find a good thermometer that is easy to use and accurate and this is the best! We had the other Braun ear thermometer without the backlight and it was great, but this one is especially great for nighttime checks without having to turn a light on to see the reading.
customer_reviews.author: Devan Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, accurate and clear/quick readings
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality thermometer. It works really well and will give you a quick and accurate reading. It is good for kids and adults and my five year old can take their own temperature when they are not feeling well. I own two of these and would happily buy another once the others cease to work.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schill

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermometer. Very easy to use and the quick start leaflet is very easy to understand. I also purchased a nice travel case to secure it and it fits perfect. I folded the quick start leaflet and stored it right next to the thermometer in the case for easy access for anyone else that needs to check my daughters temperature. This is definitely a good purchase and I will recommend it to anyone. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mullings

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate!! Unreliable! I’d rather use the simple / traditional oral thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Rihat

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is a must have for kids. It take a quick easy reading of temperature through their ear. I can even take a temperature while they are sleeping. I felt the thermometers that read their forehead would give us these inconsistent readings. This items is also eligible to be bought with a FSA card.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: We've had an endless succession of oral digital thermometers and temporal scan units, and none of them have lasted more than a few uses. This Braun was more money, but it got us thru two bouts of flu/respiratory bugs. Fingers crossed that this continues!
customer_reviews.author: James D. Besser

customer_reviews.title: All I want is back lighting.
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the ass having to dingle around every time to get a reading.. setting the age.. all I want is back lighting. Giving this thing away...
customer_reviews.author: Marc B.

customer_reviews.title: Low readings
customer_reviews.text: Was great until we had it for about 1.5 months, then reading were consistently really low (like 94) which is less than helpful :(
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Accurate.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Mine is working good. Just choose the age and you are ready to take the temperature. It's accurate. Measured 3 times at the same ear. Got twice the same and just one time different temperature. (99.8, 99.8 and 99.7). Love that it has different colors that indicate fever.
customer_reviews.author: I I

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be accurate and easy to use, just wish i didn't have to select the age every time and it would just use the last setting. Although, the age setting only relates to the color of the screen after the temp is taken, red/yellow/green.
customer_reviews.author: AntNewYork

customer_reviews.title: You'd pass on this in a store.
customer_reviews.text: You know when you shop retail, there's always one item on the shelf you would never buy just because it is the one box everyone opens, especially healthcare. This is that box to the extreme. It even has a CVS price tag on it. Clearly CVS salvaged this one and it ultimately made it's way to Amazon. It works and I'll likely keep it because of the hassle but, had I known, no way would I have purchased this expensive item. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Diel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for your home and for new moms
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has 3 settings depending on the age of your baby/toddler. It provides peace of mind that you're getting an accurate temperature, and it's also a great baby gift for new moms. Our family highly recommends!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear35

customer_reviews.title: Just great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! A life saver. quick and more easy to use. When first use try to measure the difference between this thermometer and the oral thermometer so you will know how much to add when measuring .
customer_reviews.author: Adi E.

customer_reviews.title: Look no further; this is the one!
customer_reviews.text: We really have gotten a lot of use out of this thermometer. Our children seem to get sick often and when our first one broke had it for 5years we knew exactly what one we were going to order. It has 3 different stages (infant, toddler, 3yrs and up) gives different colors Green yellow and red to let you know what’s considered a fever within range of each age group. Plus it comes with its own case and replacement ear tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple thermometers and nothing has stayed accurate. Finally I asked my doctor what they use and they have a braun. I love this!! So easy to use and great to have
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette M

customer_reviews.title: A must have for parents of young children.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thermometer! It’s super easy to use and gives an almost instant, accurate reading. The kids don’t mind it, even the toddler, and it’s so much better than trying to hold a traditional thermometer under an arm or tongue for what seems like forever. Can’t believe I went so many years without it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Best version yet.
customer_reviews.text: Inhabe had numerous.versiins of this brand and style of thermometers over the years and by far this one is my favorite. Add.its the fastest reading one. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer does not give accurate readings. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used this thermometer for my newborn and 5 and 7 year old. I was impressed at how quick it reads results and the kids didn’t mind it. My only dislike is that the red color for over 36 months doesn’t show unless it’s over 103 degrees Fahrenheit. I feel like that is too high.
customer_reviews.author: K&C

customer_reviews.title: Backlight screen , yes. Reset to adult every time, no.
customer_reviews.text: Love the back lighted screen. Don’t love having to reset to adult setting every time I use it. Takes temp quickly once that step is complete.
customer_reviews.author: Be Well

customer_reviews.title: Not overly impressed
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t like the fact that you had to insert this into the ear canal because our son wouldn’t stay still enough. We returned this.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher More

customer_reviews.title: No better home thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using BRAUN thermometers for 12 years and I can't ask for anything better. The only problem with this thermometer is the led screen seems to be shot. Thankful that there is a temp color code. Green(no fever), yellow(low grade fever) and red (high fever).
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient mainly
customer_reviews.text: It's a great digital thermometer. I don't like I have to enter the age range of the person I'm taking the temperature of before I can even take their dang temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Very quick and accurate
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this to me. It is fast and accurate. You use it even when your kid is sleeping. With replaceable tips, you can use it for everyone in the family
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Tested it at our Peniatricians, temperature reading was very accurate when compared to the docs. The only issue we have is, our baby is a premie and it’s difficult to tell if the thermometer tip is placed far enough in the ear canal for a proper reading.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I had the older model for years and it just stopped working. No it was not the batteries LOL! This new model is even better!
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Cloutier

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Item came on time and was easy to use. Everything needed was in the package. After using this item I removed the batteries because I will not be using it every day. While you have to set the item for Adult every time it is not a problem and worked easily. You will be very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing thermometer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermometer!!! We have a 4 month old and she has had a fever after every shot she has had. We had the older model but bought this one because of the back light and the age setting. The older model you could never see what it would read if you check it during the night. It would end up waking her becuae we had to have a light on. Not this one though. This is perfect! Also, reads the temperature spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Kory Shimek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent themomeater
customer_reviews.text: Updated review! It works very accurately. There are included 20pcs disposal lens filters. It was a small box in the main pakage. Great thermometer
customer_reviews.author: Euni

customer_reviews.title: Accurate & reliable
customer_reviews.text: The backlight is a huge improvement on the lower end model. When your kid is sick all night the last thing you want to do is flip on a light to read the screen. The added feature of age and the need to pick the age every time is unnecessary. A suggested improvement would be a small aiming light so you can get it correctly in your child’s ear in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Marta K.

customer_reviews.title: Completely Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Completely inaccurate at its core purpose. Temperatures will change drastically within seconds. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: momof3disneyfans

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Reads very low- 97 and below. Everything else is good- except for the most important part!
customer_reviews.author: Bad Mamma Jamma

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This has been so reliable I can completely rely on it unlike my previous thermometer which was never accurate. Perfect when you have young children that get sick a lot.
customer_reviews.author: I love tigger

customer_reviews.title: Easy quick temperature readings
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this thermometer with my HSA account money. What a great deal! I like the different options for measuring temperature between infant, child and adult. Easy to use and it came with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: RN
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work in a rehab/LTC facility; sometimes resetting the age takes a few moments longer; but am impressed with the accuracy and the speed.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Had an old model that was very dependable for 20 years or more. Expect Same with this model.
customer_reviews.text: Had an old model that worked very well and very dependable for 20 years or more.
customer_reviews.author: Walter J. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: My fav thermometer.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a family. It works for babies, kids and adults. It has helped me and always been accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine. The function of changing Fahrenheit to Celcius exists, which is good for me to interpret the figures.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Good Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: We've used it for about 3 months. It's gotten us through 1 pretty tough cold (we have a 20 month old) and countless 'let's just check' scans. So far, accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Jurado

customer_reviews.title: Best thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thermometer I’ve found. It’s very simple to use and gets a reading almost instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Melson

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: You cannot get a consistent reading on this. I will take my temp and get a high reading then I will take it in the other ear and it will be completely different. I will then check against a oral thermometer and the oral thermometer will give me a normal temp.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Though the price seems high, it works very well. No learning curve. I like the holder which makes it easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: H. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: expected more ..
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t gives the same temperature every time even if you retake in the same ear..
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I went through 3 different thermometers (trying to save money). Yes this thermometer is a little more expensive than others but it's so worth it. I have a newborn born and peace of mind getting an accurate temp was worth the little extra I paid. And so easy to use. This is a must for babies.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Fast results
customer_reviews.text: Thermometer gets fast results. The reading is very accurate. Highly recommend for small children.
customer_reviews.author: Siha257

customer_reviews.title: A little over priced
customer_reviews.text: Works good but could buy the gun for that price
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Taking the temperature of my sleepy 4 year old in the middle of the night is now quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Silver

customer_reviews.title: Best thermometer out there
customer_reviews.text: Most consistent thermometer we’ve found! We went through at least 5 other thermometers that were forehead or ear and none were ever consistent!! I don’t like how you have to use a different cap with each use but worth it because it’s so good.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Not always the absolute accuracy of measurements.
customer_reviews.text: But as our pediatrician says, the main thing is not the accuracy of the measurements, but the ability to quickly track the dynamics of temperature changes.
customer_reviews.author: Sergei Trofimov

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all. Super simple to use and very accurate. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AMT

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Readings
customer_reviews.text: I compared the temperature that the thermos can registered to a number of oral digital thermometers. The thermos can was on average 2° higher.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Odell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Can not trust its accuracy. Will vary by as much as 3 degrees between reading taken within moments of each other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use compared to some of the other choices available
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: My physician recommended this and it works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Verified Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fool proof. Easy to use. As described. No issues with receiving the package.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable- worked for 7 months then fully broke and stopped working..
customer_reviews.text: Was working great until it broke and fully stopped working 7 months later. Upsetting and disappointing for it to not even last a year at this price point and didn’t have a working thermometer in an emergency- unreliable
customer_reviews.author: LJH

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived open and used. Missing batteries, and missing extra lens covers. There was no option of an exchange and with the social distancing now in place the option of returning this item doesn’t look good. The option for exchange was not available. I am highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Braun Thermoscan
customer_reviews.text: This product is the BEST Thermoscan we have ever had. Right at this time, we both have the flu, and it sure came in handy. It's easy to see and use, and quick too. Thanks for making a great product. Rose
customer_reviews.author: ROSE

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I had a forehead scanner that was always inaccurate before this and I love this thermometer. I have a 2 year old and she tolerates it perfectly well. It’s fast easy and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Slattery

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am luving this product. In the beginning I took two to three readings at the same time to gauge the variance. To make this product even better Braun should look at how the temperature can be measured in milliseconds.
customer_reviews.author: Mohit Mediratta

customer_reviews.title: Quick readout
customer_reviews.text: Wish it remembered what age from last use. Other than that very good product
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Sonneberg

customer_reviews.title: Died for no reason
customer_reviews.text: Only one star is because it suddenly died several days ago, tried to change the battery, but did not work. Try to contact the seller, but failed... but it is simple to use... pls contact me if sellers see my comment, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Zhuzhuxiao

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace our old Braun thermometer. Works as advertised. Would definitely purchase again. 10/10 product
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: A must have for parents of small children (and for themselves!)
customer_reviews.text: These thermometers are great. I’ve found them to be very accurate and they’re so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tootie M

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thermometer th6 I have used. It's very easy to use and read. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids and babies!
customer_reviews.text: For infants and toddlers, this thermometer is quick, easy and noninvasive. Easy to read and screen shows green, yellow or red depending on the temperature to make life easier too. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Zlatek

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Should only be used after 4-6 months recommended by doctor. Very easy to use and accurate in my 1 year old compared to rectal temperature. Large letters to read and clear
customer_reviews.author: Julian Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love that this has options for age ranges. Accurate and easy to use. Great product overall
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for toddler and up
customer_reviews.text: This product would be 5 stars if it would fit in an infant’s ears, but it won’t. I would love it if they made this in a baby size.
customer_reviews.author: awcorey

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work. I'm an ER veterinary technician and sometimes it's difficult to temp my patients. This is quick and much less invasive!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Castle

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate readings
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. Thermometer will literally give you a different temp every time you use it. It’s very inaccurate
customer_reviews.author: John Grit

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and use! Can use in dark!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great to use for young and old! Love the light so you can see the big numbers. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: work great  so far
customer_reviews.text: work great and easy of use, overall like the quality
customer_reviews.author: RubberShox

customer_reviews.title: very good thermometer
customer_reviews.text: as expected from Braun, very good product. Much better than the cheaper ones i purchased before.
customer_reviews.author: gurevitch sergey

product_meta.title: Braun Thermoscan 7 Digital Ear Thermometer
product_meta.description: Designed to give you some peace of mind when your child comes down with a fever, the Braun ThermoScan 7 Ear Thermometer, IRT6520BUS with ExacTemp Technology delivers accurate temperature readings that you can trust. The Fever Guidance System will provide a color coded reading based on different levels of fever by the age group selected. Used by more pediatricians' offices than any other infrared thermometer brand, the Braun ThermoScan Ear Thermometer, IRT6520BUS features a pre-warmed tip that improves accuracy, a unique positioning system that ensures precise results, and infrared technology that takes your child's temperature in seconds.
feature_bullets: Digital Thermometer: This Digital Thermometer uses Infrared Technology to take your child’s temperature in seconds for accurate measurements time after time. It’s Ideal for infants, children & adults
AGE PRECISION TECHNOLOGY: The Fever Guidance System provides a color coded reading based on different levels of fever by age group selected. Used by more pediatricians offices than any other brand

EAR THERMOMETER ACCURACY: This digital ear thermometer measures the infrared heat generated by the eardrum and surrounding tissue, providing more accurate measurements than other types of thermometers
HYGIENIC & COMFORTABLE: The Braun ThermoScan features a pre-warmed tip for comfort & includes disposable lens filters to maintain hygiene and protect from cross-contamination between different users

Special Features;The ExactTemp system uses a light & beep to confirm proper positioning & the Memory function recalls the last 9 temperature readings, allowing you to keep track of fluctuations; BPA and latex free

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
